changeSet.id: PB-8250 Shared ID and Username for customers and accounts
changeSet.author: elasticpath
changeSet.comment: Remove USER_ID in favor of SHARED_ID, and add USERNAME to TCUSTOMERAUTHENTICATION

changeSet.id: PB-8250 Migrate Data SHARED_ID for customers
changeSet.author: elasticpath
changeSet.sql: UPDATE TCUSTOMER tc SET SHARED_ID = CONCAT(CONCAT(STORECODE,':'),USER_ID) WHERE tc.CUSTOMER_TYPE != 'ACCOUNT'

changeSet.id: PB-8250 Migrate Data to SHARED_ID for accounts
changeSet.author: elasticpath
changeSet.sql: UPDATE TCUSTOMER tc SET SHARED_ID = USER_ID WHERE tc.CUSTOMER_TYPE = 'ACCOUNT'

changeSet.id: PB-8250 Eliminate duplicate for customers for the same story
changeSet.author: elasticpath
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TSHARED_ID SELECT UIDPK, concat(SHARED_ID, floor(RAND() * 100)) FROM TCUSTOMER WHERE SHARED_ID IN (SELECT SHARED_ID FROM TCUSTOMER GROUP BY SHARED_ID, CUSTOMER_TYPE HAVING count(*) > 1);
UPDATE TCUSTOMER tc, TSHARED_ID ts SET tc.SHARED_ID = ts.SHARED_ID WHERE tc.UIDPK = ts.UIDPK

changeSet.id: PB-8250 Eliminate duplicate for customers for the same story Oracle db
changeSet.author: elasticpath
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TSHARED_ID SELECT UIDPK, concat(SHARED_ID, floor(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(0, 100))) FROM TCUSTOMER WHERE SHARED_ID IN (SELECT SHARED_ID FROM TCUSTOMER GROUP BY SHARED_ID, CUSTOMER_TYPE HAVING count(*) > 1);
UPDATE TCUSTOMER tc SET SHARED_ID = (SELECT ts.SHARED_ID FROM TSHARED_ID ts WHERE ts.UIDPK = tc.UIDPK) WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM TSHARED_ID ts WHERE ts.UIDPK = tc.UIDPK);

changeSet.author: elasticpath
changeSet.sql: UPDATE TCUSTOMERAUTHENTICATION ta SET ta.USERNAME = ( select USER_ID from TCUSTOMER tc where ta.UIDPK = tc.UIDPK AND tc.CUSTOMER_TYPE != 'ACCOUNT' ) where exists ( select * from TCUSTOMER tc where ta.UIDPK = tc.UIDPK AND tc.CUSTOMER_TYPE != 'ACCOUNT' )
